text: Karnobat Municipality (Bulgarian: Община Карнобат, Obshtina Karnobat) is a municipality in Burgas Province, Bulgaria. It includes the town of Karnobat and a number of villages. ==Demographics== === Religion === According to the latest Bulgarian census of 2011, the religious composition, among those who answered the optional question on religious identification, was the following: == References == ==External links== *
title: Karnobat Municipality
